GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.17.15
GSD.description:
net: mdio: unexport __init-annotated mdio_bus_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit f5c68137f1191ba3fcf6260ec71b30be2e2bf4c3, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 90eff9096c01ba90cdae504a6b95ee87fe2556a3. For more details please see the references link.
